lead_paragraph: The encounter on Tuesday over the South China Sea is the latest sign of growing tensions over China’s territorial claims and tactics in the waterway.

byline.contributor: Yufan Huang contributed research from Beijing.

headline.print_headline: U.S. and China Have Close Encounter in Air
headline.main: Chinese Aircraft Fly Within 50 Feet of U.S. Plane Over South China Sea, Pentagon Says

snippet: The encounter on Tuesday over the South China Sea is the latest sign of growing tensions over China’s territorial claims and tactics in the waterway.
abstract: American surveillance plane on routine patrol in international airspace over South China Sea encounters Chinese aircraft, as two countries continue to trade provocations in disputed area.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
